abstract: A closer look at Australia's move to put a price on CO2.
snippet: A closer look at Australia's move to put a price on CO2.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of Australia's move to add a price to carbon dioxide emissions -- which is particularly notable considering the country is one of the world's big exporters of coal (and related CO2 emissions) -- I sent a query to some Australian analysts of climate and energy policy to see if this holds lessons for the United States.
